Title: Prohibits a battery energy storage system on Long Island
Summary: Provides that the future siting and construction of battery energy storage systems and related facilities, systems, infrastructure, and substations of any scale and possessing any storage capacity, and including, but not limited to, those deploying lithium-ion batteries, are prohibited on Long Island, in the counties of Suffolk and Nassau.
LawCode: Add ยง137, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to prohibiting the siting of battery energy storage system sites on Long Island
